Message:
My dream is journeying to
the farthest corners of the world.

There’s no way our current
map of the world is finished.
I just know it...

cause the world just can’t
possibly be this small!

The map cuts off partway,
but the sea still goes and goes!

I’m sure there’s a world out there
on the other side of the sea
that just hasn’t been
drawn on the map yet!

I wonder what shape it is~?
Just thinking about it
gets me all fired up~♪

That’s why I decided to go out
and discover it for myself!

The cut-off part of the map...
the farthest corners of the world
that no one’s ever seen before!

A map that shows
the whole world—
a world map
just for me, Eureka!
